Posts.EditableText:
By default, Quest supports the verb open for containers, but no longer allows
```do (this, "open")```
as a way of adding a synonym, perhaps because the "open" attribute now describes whether the object can be opened.
Is there some other way of adding a synonym?
Posts.HTML:
By default, Quest supports the verb open for containers, but no longer allows
do (this, "open")
as a way of adding a synonym, perhaps because the "open" attribute now describes whether the object can be opened.
Is there some other way of adding a synonym?

Posts.EditableText:
`TryOpenClose(true, this)`

(if the first parameter is false, it will try to close the object)
Posts.HTML:
TryOpenClose(true, this)

(if the first parameter is false, it will try to close the object)
